content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) is connected to a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) is connected to a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)
### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), a boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and a steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5) is connected to a pipe group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) is connected to a pipe group at position(x=105.5 y=-32.5)
### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5) and another transport belt at position(x=64.5 y=-53.5)
### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have a sufficient fuel supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to avoid downtime.
### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items to operate on.
- Regularly check the inventory of entities to avoid waiting for source items.
### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source.
- Regularly check the connections between entities to avoid disconnections.
### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network.
- Regularly check the connections between entities to avoid disconnections.
### Errors when pipe groups are empty
- Ensure that pipe groups have a sufficient fluid supply before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fluid status of pipe groups to avoid downtime.
### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have a sufficient supply of ingredients before starting operations.
- Regularly check the inventory of entities to avoid waiting for ingredients.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
